title: Vintage Curling Veigar still broken after 3+ Patches
body:
Can this please be looked into for real? I made sure to test it every patch and it hasnt been working for a long time. I bought this skin back in Dec 2010

EDIT: HOW THIS SHOULD LOOK https://i.imgur.com/EkM08FN.jpg

replies.body:
Thanks for the report! I did follow up last time with the team to ensure they were aware of it. Not sure what the status is, but I can check today! Sorry for the delay on this. D:

**EDIT**: Trying to get a fix in for next patch - not guaranteed ATM, though.
I made sure to test it every patch. lol
